summary: Ever thought it was silly that the powerful master-level spell Dead Thrall only worked on people? Fixed that for ya. Dead thrall will now work on most animals and creatures.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Powerful Dead Thrall[/b]

This is a very simple, very clean little mod that removed the "NPC-only" restriction from the master-level Conjuration spell Dead Thrall. Several other mods that claim to do the same thing didn't work for me, so I decided to make my own.

Dead Thrall will now permanently revive most animals and creatures. Things that it WON'T work on (for balance and practicality):

-Mammoths
-Giants
-Dragons
-Dwarven automatons
-Ghosts
-Daedra

[b]Normal version: [/b]
Revives NPCs and most animals/creatures up to level 40.

[b]No level-cap version: [/b]
Revive ANY NPC or creature, no matter how powerful (except creatures on the list above).

[b]Cleaned with TES5edit. This mod will not crash your game.[/b]
author: steelfeathers
